title: LF Gold+ Support for Duo
body:
AD Carry player looking for a support duo partner, hit me up!

IGN: Rkz

replies.body:
keen to duo with you.
ill be on tonight.
ign: span
i play all lanes, especially ADC, i main Jayce adc {{champion:126}} , i also main Yorick support {{champion:83}} , or i play thresh adc, that works as well, or i can teemo adc XD
i'm keen. can play all supports proficiently, best with janna thresh. ign ColdBlood
